title: Leona animation update
body: Hopefully this is the right board for this. Over the last week or so i've been thinking about leona's Q animation, i just feel like it should have more of an impact like Pantheons auto attack with his sheild. As i mean this is meant to stun them and all it really looks like she does is move her shield gently towards them, it doesnt feel like theres any impact.

replies.body: Hate to necro my own thread but i got 0 responces and i think its something that could do with at least a glance at.
